DataShape.description: DataShape used for returning a list of notification handlers
DataShape.name: NotificationHandlers

FieldDefinition.description: The name of the data shape representing configuration data for the handler
FieldDefinition.name: configuration

FieldDefinition.description: The identifier for the type of supported notification handler
FieldDefinition.name: handlerID

FieldDefinition.description: The localized name for the type of notifications handler
FieldDefinition.name: localizedName

FieldDefinition.description: The name of the service for sending notifications on the handler
FieldDefinition.name: serviceName
